original_text: We took all the towns on the plateau, and all Gilead, and all Bashan as far as Salekah and Edrei, towns of Og’s kingdom in Bashan.
korean_text: 우리가 빼앗은 것은 평원의 모든 성읍과 길르앗 온 땅과 바산의 온 땅 곧 옥의 나라 바산의 성읍 살르가와 에드레이까지이니라

sentences.original_text: We took all the towns on the plateau
and all Bashan as far as Salekah and Edrei
towns of Og's kingdom in Bashan
sentences.korean_translation: 바산에 있는 오그 왕국의 성읍들을 점령했습니다
